headline: Jim Cramer Discusses Martin Marietta Stock Rally Since April Lows
summary: Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (NYSE:MLM) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer recently shed light on. Cramer mentioned the stock during the episode, as he stated: “Okay, what’s going on with the stock of Martin Marietta Materials… Over the past few years, this company’s been a big beneficiary of federal infrastructure spending, and there’s […]
